title: Siren's Fire
description: A journey of forbidden love, and destiny!Cicilia goes to Rome, in search of the truth about her mother, but what she finds will change her life forever. Up until now, Cicilia's family history has been kept a secret, until she meets Dante, someone who will show her a side of her family she never dreamed was possible. Cicilia falls in love with her family's mortal enemy, and now she must go on a journey to find out the truth, and fight for the one she loves.
author: K.M. Wells
